articles.title: Elsa Raven, 'Back to the Future' and 'Titanic' actress, dies at 91 - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Raven, known as the "Save the Clock Tower" lady, died Tuesday in Los Angeles.
articles.content:
Actress Elsa Raven, known for appearing in Back to the Future and Titanic, died Monday at age 91, EW has confirmed. Deadline first reported the news.
